source.5a6483d7:
def dropCol(data , col): #5
    return data.drop(col , axis=1 , inplace=True)
source.000c1397:
def getMostPaid(data): #7
    dFrameMax = data[checkCanceled(data)]['adr'].idxmax()
    return data.loc[dFrameMax][['name','adr']]
source.9ceecd72:
def getAvgStay(data): #9
    dFrameStay = data[checkCanceled(data)]
    dFrameStay = dFrameStay['stays_in_weekend_nights'] + dFrameStay['stays_in_week_nights']
    return round(dFrameStay.mean() , 2)
source.f9011994:
def getTopSpecialRequest(data): #10
    dFrame = data[checkCanceled(data)]
    dFrameSpecial = dFrame.loc[dFrame['total_of_special_requests']==5]
    return dFrameSpecial[['name','email']]
source.905c9116:
def getMostSurnames(data): #11
    dFrame = data[checkCanceled(data)]
    return dFrame['name'].str.split().str[1].value_counts()[:5] # get
source.0960af3a:
def getMostBabies(data): #12
    dFrame = data[checkCanceled(data)]
    return dFrame.sort_values( ['babies' , 'children'] , ascending=False )[ ['name','babies','children'] ]
source.7c917b91:
def getMostPhoneNumber(data): #13
    dFrame = data[checkCanceled(data)]
    return dFrame['phone-number'].apply(lambda x: x.split('-')[0]).value_counts()[:3]
